entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
